action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Jaqui,

Sure. Confirming that we have made the updates and ready for you to  review. We also created a backup for the membership page so we can revert it back anytime.

Here is the link:
https://wolper.com.au/membership/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi Rica

We have decided that the Membership page does not need to have the green form on it at all this year. Can you please remove it however keep it somewhere for us to bring back next year when we start charging again? We don't want to lose the page next year and then have to try and remember what was on it.

Please also delete these words on the page

Renew here

Thank you for your interest in renewing your membership. Wolper would like to acknowledge your loyalty by extending your membership for a year at no cost to you. Our secure online form will collect all the required details. You can choose to add a donation during this process.

Once you have submitted the membership form, you will receive an acknowledgment email. If you don't receive this email, please check your junk/spam folder or call us on 02 9328 6077 to discuss.

And change the words to the following

Thank you for your interest in renewing your membership. As we are living in challenging times, Wolper is acknowledging your loyalty by automatically extending your membership for 1 year at no cost to you.

If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation to the Hospital it would be of great assistance and much appreciated as we meet the challenges of the current pandemic. This can be done at wolper.com.au/donation

Many thanks

Jaqui

full_threads.body: Actually when you say you removed the credit card field in the Step 3 of the form in the page https://wolper.com.au/membership/ …….I wanted the whole 'payment details' step to be removed. So that there is no step 3.

Thankyou Rica. This is great. I am sending through another request now but in a separate email.

Cheers

Jaqui

Hi Jaqui,

We have updated the text in the bottom of the form in page https://wolper.com.au/new-membership/ and removed the credit card field in the Step 3 of the form in the page  https://wolper.com.au/membership/ .

Please let us know if you would like further changes.

Thanks Rica

Couple more changes

On this page https://wolper.com.au/new-membership/

On the green form we say "Upon submission of this application form, a representative from Wolper Jewish Hospital will contact you for payment details for your membership. We greatly appreciate your support of the Hospital."

Can you please change it to "Upon submission of this application form, a representative from Wolper Jewish Hospital will contact you. We greatly appreciate your support of the Hospital."

On this page https://wolper.com.au/membership/

On the green form we ask for payment details as step#3. Can you remove this step as we don't want to ask for them

Thanks

full_threads.body:
Hi Jaqui, 

Hope all is well. Confirming we have now made the changes listed below and they are ready for you to review. 

  • removed 'Which membership option would you like" "1 year membership or 2 year membership" in the page https://wolper.com.au/new-membership/
  • changed the paragraphs under the heading 'Renew here'  and  removed "Renewal Period" "1 year renewal $30" "2 year renewal $60" in the page https://wolper.com.au/membership/
Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica


We have decided to make membership of the hospital free for this coming year. We therefore need to make some changes to the pages and the green forms on our membership page.


Page

https://wolper.com.au/new-membership/


Can you please remove 'Which membership option would you like" "1 year membership or 2 year membership"


Page

https://wolper.com.au/membership/


1. Can you please change the paragraphs under the heading 'Renew here' to the following


"Thank you for your interest in renewing your membership. Wolper would like to acknowledge your loyalty by extending your membership for a year at no cost to you. Our secure online form will collect all the required details. You can choose to add a donation during this process.


Once you have submitted the membership form, you will receive an acknowledgment email. If you don't receive this email, please check your junk/spam folder or call us on 02 9328 6077 to discuss."


2. On the form can you remove "Renewal Period" "1 year renewal $30" "2 year renewal $60"


Please send to me for approval before publishing it.


Many thanks

Jaqui




Jaqui Herman

Operations Assistant

Wolper Jewish Hospital
